title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and shell wrapper around the Ollama API with history, syntax highlighting, shortcuts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility and reactive (RxJava) wrappers.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, list, delete models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK with strongly-typed request/response models and streaming.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and example compose stacks (CPU & GPU variants) for easy self-hosting.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling hints.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain to chat with local PDFs or text files.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets users chat with any pulled Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-npm-package
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: same functionality as the GitHub repo but distributed for easy pip installs.

title: ollama-rfcs
summary: Public RFC repository where the Ollama team discusses upcoming features (tool use, multi-modal, etc.).

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Registry of community-submitted Modelfiles for Llama, Phi, Mistral, CodeLlama, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for troubleshooting, model sharing, benchmarks and feature requests around Ollama.
